en.title: FusionExcel's Achievers Recognition Dinner Vietnam 22th August 2009!
en.content:
REPORT BY PRESIDENTIAL DIRECTORS PAUL & DORIS LEE.

FusionExcel's Achievers Recognition Dinner in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam on 22nd August 2009 was another resounding success with over 500 people attending the event. Based on the healthy attendance it is obvious that the interest level of the Vietnamese market is moving forward in the right direction.

Thanks to FusionExcel International and the Vietnam Country Licensee for another great event. Among the guests were VIPs which includes FE Founder Director Mr K S Lee, Retired General Le Thanh Hai (Chairman of Ho Chi Minh City Foundation For The Poor), FE Vietnam Spokesman & former Mr Vietnam Mr Ly Duc, FE Vietnam Spokesperson & Miss Vietnam Tourism Ms Phan Thi Ngoc Diem, FusionExcel Consultant Master Yap and a number of other dignitaries.

Highlights Of The Event Include:

- Cultural Dance by Vietnamese Children Dance Troupe.
-

Welcome Speech by Vietnam Country Licensee's General Manager Mr Nguyen Hoang Huy.
- Speech by FE Founder Director, Mr K S Lee.
-

Product Talk and Demonstrations by Master Yap of the Power of FE's Quantum Pendant.
- Cheque Presentation of VND 50 million by FE Founder Director Mr K S  Lee &  Country Licensee of Vietnam Mr Nguyen Duc Doan to Retired General Le Thanh Hai, Chairman of HCMC Foundation For The Poor and presentation of 60 Quantum Pendants for the foundation to kick start Social Entrepreneurship to help Children With Innate Heart Diseases in South Vietnam. 
- Quantum Pendant Testimonial by FE's Vietnam Spokesman, Champion Body Builder and former 
Mr Vietnam, Ly Duc.
- Sharing by FE's Presidential Director Mr Paul L B Lee.
- Mr KS Lee invites all Presidential Directors on stage and presents Directors Award to new Vietnamese Directors, Tong May Ngo Hoanh & Tran Nhuan An.
- Speech by New Director Tran Nhuan An.
-

Sharing by FE's Presidential Director Goh Thian Chai.
- Lucky Draws.

A BIG THANK YOU to Vietnam Country Licensee Mr Nguyen Duc Doan and his very committed team for organizing yet another great event!  

AHOO! AHOO!! AHOO!!!
